info.name: BBC DARK KNIGHT
info.description: Dark theme for BBC Homepage, BBC News and BBC Sport.
info.additionalInfo:
Change log:

12.07.2018 Just some housekeeping on new elements. 

01.05.2016 Added CSS for BBC Homepage. Fixed separator lines between top stories on News, not too bright now. Fixed BBC Sport old style football team pages (when will they update them?!).

24.05.2016 Updated Sport Live page after BBC revamp

23.03.2016 Added some more specific colors to sections instead of global default, such as in navigation bars.

22.03.2016 Fixed header color and several internal boxes. More coherence between BBC News and BBC Sport

18.03.2016 Fixed some of my layout tweaks so that this is also compatible with BBC News.
